name: extract-mentions
description: Extract @mentions from a string at a specified path

input.description: Any JSON object containing a string value at the specified path

path.description: Dot-separated path to the string field (e.g., 'message', 'user.comment')

output.description: Array of @mentions found in the string (e.g., ['@user1', '@user2']). Returns empty array if no mentions, field doesn't exist, or value is not a string
